backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two UI theme update tasks with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including theme, pages, components, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark CSS variables for a copper-themed design.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration mapping site routes to their page components.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper with navigation, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus and active‑link styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Hook and provider managing Internet Identity auth, login flow, and persisted identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables implementing the darker copper palette for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/BlankPage.tsx: Exports a placeholder page that renders nothing.
frontend/src/pages/DivisionsPage.tsx: Displays themed content cards describing various Brotherhood divisions with images and text.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Defines structured historical lore sections and renders them in styled cards and separators.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero text, navigation buttons, and feature cards linking to other sections.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoPage.tsx: Shows images and descriptions of T‑10 power armor and its accessories in styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/RanksPage.tsx: Presents detailed rank hierarchy information using cards and icon‑labeled sections.
frontend/src/pages/UniformArmorVariantsB: React page rendering styled hero and rank-based armor descriptions using custom UI components and copper-themed visuals.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme tokens, extended colors, animations, and plugins including custom copper shadow and OKLCH-based palette.
project_state.json: JSON metadata capturing project state, existing features, and pending requests related to updating the site's copper color theme.
